extendedIngredients.name: almonds
extendedIngredients.original: 1/4 cup sliced almonds, toasted and cooled

extendedIngredients.name: cranberries
extendedIngredients.original: 1 (12-ounces) bag fresh or thawed frozen cranberries

title: Cranberry and Celery Relish
summary: Cranberry and Celery Relish might be just the side dish you are searching for. Watching your figure? This gluten free and vegan recipe has 320 calories, 3g of protein, and 6g of fat per serving. This recipe serves 3 and costs $1.16 per serving. 1 person were impressed by this recipe. If you have almonds, celery, cranberries, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 2 hours. With a spoonacular score of 37%, this dish is rather bad. Try Pickled Celery Relish, Carrot and Celery Relish, and Celery Root Soup with Clementine-Relish Toasts for similar recipes.
instructions: Preparation                                                        Simmer cranberries, sugar, water, and 1/4 teaspoon salt in a heavy medium saucepan, uncovered, stirring occasionally, until most of cranberries have burst, 15 to 20 minutes. Transfer to a bowl and cool completely.                                                                Just before serving, stir in celery and almonds.                                                Cooks' note:            •Cranberries can be cooked 1 week ahead and chilled. •Almonds can be toasted 1 week ahead and kept in an airtight container at room temperature or chilled.

steps.step: Simmer cranberries, sugar, water, and 1/4 teaspoon salt in a heavy medium saucepan, uncovered, stirring occasionally, until most of cranberries have burst, 15 to 20 minutes.
Transfer to a bowl and cool completely.
Just before serving, stir in celery and almonds.
•Cranberries can be cooked 1 week ahead and chilled. •Almonds can be toasted 1 week ahead and kept in an airtight container at room temperature or chilled.
